BALL::ResiduePredicate

BALL::ResiduePredicate Class Reference

#include <BALL/KERNEL/standardPredicates.h>

Inheritance diagram for BALL::ResiduePredicate:

List of all members.


Public Member Functions

virtual bool operator() (const Atom &atom) const

Detailed Description

Predicate for matching residues. Returns true, if the name of the residue that the atom belongs to matches exactly the argument of this predicate.
